cypherfox wrote:

> How the heck do people mock things like database
> access classes, mail servers, arbitrary web requests,
> etc., without writing a huge amount of logic?

Surprisingly easily. You might just need some good examples. See _JUnit 
Recipes_, part 2, for details.

> What am I missing?

It's tough to say. Without looking at a specific example, I can't say 
much more. Can you get concrete about a mock you wrote that exploded out 
of control? Can we see code?
